content: owl bookmark supplies 3mm hook dk wool in the following colours owl body owl wings yellow white black brown green please note - all terms are uk crochet terms chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half treble treble_crochet - treble dtr - treble_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st - stitch owl using body colour chain 2 in a magic_ring then 12tr into ring join with a slip_stitch to top of 1st treble_crochet chain 2 then 2 treble_crochet into same stitch 2 treble_crochet in every stitch around join with a slip_stitch and finish off join wing colour to any stitch chain 1 and double_crochet in same stitch 2tr in next stitch 2dtr 2tr 2htr double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet dtr chain 3 slip_stitch into 3rd chain from hook treble_crochet all into the next stitch double_crochet in next 4 stitches then treble_crochet chain 3 slip_stitch into 3rd chain from hook dtr treble_crochet into next stitch double_crochet double_crochet 2htr 2tr 2dtr 2tr 2 double_crochet finish off join foot colour in 1st of remaining 4 stitches of body chain 2 2htr in same stitch slip_stitch in next 2 stitches 3htr in last stitch finish off eyes make 2 using eye colour make 6dc in a magic_ring join with a slip_stitch and finish off use black to sew pupils on sew eyes to body and sew on a beak using yellow wool branch in branch colour chain 45 double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and next 7 chain chain 6 then double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and next 4 chain fork made half_double_crochet along remaining chain leaving last 8 chain unworked chain 6 then double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and next 4 chain then double_crochet in remaining unworked 8 chain 2nd fork made finish off leaf make 3 using leaf colour chain 6 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook double_crochet in next chain half_double_crochet in next chain treble_crochet in next chain 4tr in last chain then work back along opposite side of the chain as follows treble_crochet in next stitch half_double_crochet in next double_crochet in next slip_stitch in next stitch and finish off assembly attach leaves to branch as desired and sew owl feet to branch next to one of the forks place the bookmark face down on an ironing board cover with a cloth and press gently with an iron to flatten it refer to yarn manufacturer for heat settings
